SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.areas

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.GameController
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestGameArea
public class GameController extends Object
Controller for complex methods related to rooms and map code.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameArea gameArea, LevelFactory levelFactory, Entity player, boolean shouldLoad, MapLoadConfig config)
      Initialise this Game Area to use the provided levelFactory.
      Parameters:
      levelFactory - the provided levelFactory.
      player - the main player entity.
      shouldLoad - flag to determine if a saved state should be loaded.
      config - the configuration for map loading.

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameArea gameArea, LevelFactory levelFactory, Entity player)
      Initialise this Game Area to use the provided levelFactory without loading a saved state.
      Parameters:
      levelFactory - the provided levelFactory.
      player - the main player entity.

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameArea gameArea, LevelFactory levelFactory, Entity player, Boolean shouldLoad)
      Initialise this Game Area to use the provided levelFactory without loading a saved state.
      Parameters:
      levelFactory - the provided levelFactory.
      player - the main player entity.
      shouldLoad - if the game should be loaded.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Create the game area, including terrain, static entities (trees), and dynamic entities (player).

    • getFlaggedRoom

      public String getFlaggedRoom(String roomType)
      Get the room key for a specified flagged room type.
      Parameters:
      roomType - The type of room to get the key for. Valid values are "Boss", "NPC", and "GameRoom".
      Returns:
      The room key for the specified room type, or null if the room type is invalid.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid room type is provided.

    • getPlayer

      public Entity getPlayer()
      Get the main player of this game area.
      Returns:
      the player entity.

    • getCurrentRoom

      public Room getCurrentRoom()
      Get the current room the player is in.
      Returns:
      the current Room object.

    • saveMapData

      public void saveMapData()
      Uses MainGameLevelFactory to save all the completed room numbers and the seed of the map as a JSON file which can be loaded when the load button is pressed.

    • changeRooms

      public void changeRooms(String roomKey)
      Changes the current room to a new room specified by the room key.
      Parameters:
      roomKey - the key of the room to change to.

    • spawnCurrentRoom

      public void spawnCurrentRoom()
      Spawns the current room if it hasn't been spawned yet.

    • changeLevel

      public void changeLevel(int levelNumber)
      Changes the current level to a new level specified by the level number.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - the number of the level to change to.

    • getCurrentLevel

      public Level getCurrentLevel()
      Gets the current level.
      Returns:
      the current Level object.

    • getGameArea

      public GameArea getGameArea()
      Gets the GameArea.
      Returns:
      the current GameArea object.
